title: Python and Spreadsheets: State of the Union, Oct 2014
description:
At PyTexas 2013 I gave a talk on using Python to work with spreadsheets.
The landscape is rapidly changing and the options have expanded. This
talk will be a whirlwind tour of your options for using Python with
spreadsheets (NOT just Excel) as of late 2014. From processing
spreadsheet *files* to using Python to directly control a spreadsheet
app, we'll see what's available, with a focus on how it can help **you**
with what you work on.
